typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		LGALGAID as string,
		LGALCAID as string,
		LGALN2 as decimal(38,18),
		LGACRCODE as string,
		LGARECEIVER as decimal(38,18),
		LGASTATUS as string,
		LGASTDATE as decimal(38,18),
		LGAENDATE as decimal(38,18),
		LGAGUACURR as string,
		LGAGUAAMT as decimal(38,18),
		LGAINTNOTE as string,
		LGAJURISDICTION as string,
		LGAOBOPEAID as decimal(38,18),
		LGACLMCAT as string,
		LGACRLGAID as string,
		LGAOBOCNAME as string,
		LGACANDATE as decimal(38,18),
		LGALCCID as string,
		LGAINTYNSW as string,
		LGACRYNSW as string,
		LGALUDATE as decimal(38,18),
		LGACRDATE as decimal(38,18),
		LGALUSIGN as string,
		LGACRSIGN as string,
		LGACRCRDATE as decimal(38,18),
		LGACRCRSIGN as string,
		LGAKNVMARK as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> pLgatable
